Steps.Message: Images are augmentations that can be added to scenes to decorate, notate or even just increase visibility. Let's start by taking a picture with your phone to add to the scene.
Now that we've taken the picture, let's add a caption to it.
Write something you'd like to see next to the given image. Press Next when you're done.
Let's load the image into the scene. To do that, just click the Apply button below.
Let's lower the UI so we can take a look at the augmentation we just created.
This is the augmentation we just created. While in edit mode you can change its size and move it around by pressing on the corners and edges. That's it for the tutorial!
